q: State of the Union policy address Tuesday night. Colin Powell also lamented the lack of civility in political discourse and urged Americans to display tolerance in the wake of the shooting in Tucson, Arizona. I think he's got a way to go, Colin Powell said.`` I mean, he hasn't achieved all of his purposes, but he's stabilized the economy'' and taken on health care reform.`` You know, we didn't elect Superman.
